prompt: An ethereal artifact glows with otherworldly energy, levitating against a backdrop of vibrant nebulae and countless stars. The relic is intricately designed with cosmic symbols and emits a soft, luminous aura. Multi-colored gas clouds and distant galaxies form a breathtaking celestial tapestry around the relic, invoking a sense of ancient cosmic power and mystery. The artwork is a perfect blend of detailed mysticism and the vastness of space, capturing the beauty and wonder of the universe.
